video.title: K
video.synopsis: A young boy is wanted for a crime he has no recollection of committing and must go on the run, hunted by two powerful kings and their forces.

episodes.synopsis: The Homra clan attacks a gang-owned hotel and is confronted by rival Scepter 4. High school student Shiro suddenly finds himself caught in the middle.
episodes.title: Knight

episodes.synopsis: Shiro escapes from Kuroh and returns to school with a price on his head. Then, his magical pet leads him on a wild goose chase that saves his life.
episodes.title: Kitten

episodes.synopsis: Mikoto wonders when the fading Red King will choose a successor; Kuroh teaches Shiro about the seven clans, their power and Shiro's possible destiny.
episodes.title: Kitchen

episodes.synopsis: Shiro tries to prove his innocence to Kuroh -- and himself; Homra and Scepter 4 hone in on Shiro's location; Misaki and Rikio arrive at Ashinaka.
episodes.title: Knock-On Effect

episodes.synopsis: While Shiro is in the city, Seri, Saruhiko and their Ashinaka foes Misaka and Rikio go to extremes to get information about Shiro.
episodes.title: Knife

episodes.synopsis: Shiro questions his own reality as the familiar markers of his past start to disappear; Kuro refuses an opportunity to kill Shiro until he knows more.
episodes.title: Karma

episodes.synopsis: Scepter 4 prepares to arrest Shiro, but Neko helps him escape; Kuro battles Reisi; Shiro turns to Neko to recover his lost memories and find truth.
episodes.title: Key

episodes.synopsis: Shiro's recovered memory reveals dealings with the Silver King; Reisi plans to conquer the Silver King, unaware that Shiro is also moving toward him.
episodes.title: Kindling

episodes.synopsis: In 1945 Germany, Adolf and his sister experiment with a magical relic; a mystery man taunts Mikoto into a prison break and an attack on Scepter 4.
episodes.title: Knell

episodes.synopsis: Homra takes over the campus and Scepter 4 waits in the wings as they search for Shiro; Kuroh and Neko sneak onto the campus to rescue their friends.
episodes.title: Kaleidoscope

episodes.synopsis: After the Blue and Red Kings clash, Homra and Scepter 4 forces do battle; Mikoto defends Shiro and helps him escape attack, until Kukuri stops him.
episodes.title: Killer

episodes.synopsis: Shiro remembers his travails as the Silver King and the events that led to his amnesia; Neko helps Shiro confront the Colorless King.
episodes.title: Adolf K. Weismann

episodes.synopsis: Reisi and Mikoto fight while Shiro tries to catch the Colorless King, willing to make the ultimate sacrifice; Mikoto demonstrates true heroism.
episodes.title: King
